logo.label: Logo image
logo.info: The text version will be used if empty.

logo_text.label: Logo text
logo_text.info: The store's name will be used if empty.

button_shape.label: Buy now, comment, sign in and register buttons shape

product_tag_shape.label: Sale and sold out tags shape

font.label: Font
font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

product_grid_interactive_enable.label: Show product info on mouse over

product_grid_secondary_enable.label: Show secondary image on mouse over

product_grid_mouseover_opacity.label: Mouse over overlay transparency
product_grid_mouseover_opacity.info: Adjust to achieve a better title readability

product_grid_mouseover_gradient_enable.label: Use gradient as mouse over overlay

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px.

custom_liquid.label: Custom code
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

pinterest_sharing_articles.label: Enable Pinterest sharing
pinterest_sharing_articles.info: Blog post will need to have a featured image.

paragraph.content: To add post featured images, [edit your posts.](/admin/articles)
Edit your product card settings in the "Theme settings" section.

collection_image_opacity.label: Collection image opacity image scale
collection_image_opacity.info: Adjust to achieve a better title readability.

product.label: Product
product.info: You can use online tools, like [removebg](https://www.remove.bg/) or [removal.ai](https://removal.ai/), to remove the background from your product images.

image.label: Custom image
image.info: We recommend an image with transparent background.

header__1.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header__2.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

menu.label: Menu
menu.info: This menu won't show dropdown items.

paragraph.content: Edit your social settings and accounts in the "Theme settings" section.
Subscribers will be added to your “accepts marketing” [customer list.](/admin/customers?segment_query=email_subscription_status%20%3D%20%27SUBSCRIBED%27%20)

paragraph__1.content: You can adjust the logo in the "Theme settings" section.

show_social_icons.label: Show social icons
show_social_icons.info: Edit your social settings and accounts in the "Theme settings" section.

transparent_header_logo.label: Logo image
transparent_header_logo.info: Default logo will be used if empty.

enable_sticky_header.label: Enable sticky header
enable_sticky_header.info: Header shows on the screen as customers scroll down.

header__6.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header__7.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments).

paragraph__2.content: You can adjust the header's section settings in the "Theme settings" section.

name.label: Menu item
name.info: Add the menu item that you want to turn into a mega menu.

video.label: Video
video.info: Optional. Upload your mp4 video to the [Files folder](/admin/settings/files) and copy here the link. [Learn more](https://small-victories.notion.site/How-do-I-add-background-videos-9c85d166de0648fc9caa683bc1a0dc3b)

video_mobile.label: Mobile video
video_mobile.info: Optional. Upload your mp4 video to the [Files folder](/admin/settings/files) and copy here the link. You can use [this tool](https://ezgif.com/crop-video) to crop your video. [Learn more](https://small-victories.notion.site/How-do-I-add-background-videos-9c85d166de0648fc9caa683bc1a0dc3b).

pinterest_sharing_articles.label: Enable Pinterest sharing
pinterest_sharing_articles.info: Blog post will need to have a featured image.

paragraph__1.content: To change collection descriptions or collection images, [edit your collections.](/admin/collections)

show_collection_image.label: Show collection image
show_collection_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio.

paragraph__2.content: Edit your product card settings in the "Theme settings" section.

paragraph.content: All of your collections are listed by default. To customize your list, choose 'Selected' and add collections.

collection_image_opacity.label: Collection image opacity
collection_image_opacity.info: Adjust to achieve a better title readability

available_stock_units.name: Available stock units
available_stock_units.content: Check [this tutorial](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/inventory) to activate tracking on your product inventory.

swatches_selector.label: Option name for swatches
swatches_selector.info: Write the variant option name that will display swatches. Use a comma separated list to support multiple options: "Color, Colour". Learn more about how to properly set up your color swatches [here](https://small-victories.notion.site/How-do-I-set-up-color-swatches-8c52a0245c8042ecab7f80a306c79e8a).

popup_selector.label: Option name for information popup
popup_selector.info: Write the variant option name that will display a link to the information popup. Example: "Size".

popup_page.label: Information popup content
popup_page.info: Choose a page as a source for the popup content. You can add text, tables, or images to this page.

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_pickup_availability.label: Show pickup availability info
show_pickup_availability.info: When available, you can display whether a specific product variant is available for local pickup. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/local-methods/local-pickup)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

content.label: Tab content
content.info: You can use "product metafields" and "dynamic sources" to have specific content for each product. [Lear more](https://small-victories.notion.site/How-do-I-have-different-product-information-in-the-Collapsible-tab-block-496281f0c9494abd8fd07ce7ff66e37a)

paragraph.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/os20/themes-by-shopify/dawn/page-types#product-rating-block)

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

enable_sticky_info.label: Enable sticky content on large screens

first_variant_media_enabled.label: Show first available variant media on page load

map_address.label: Map address
map_address.info: Google Maps will find the exact location.

api_key.label: Google Maps API key
api_key.info: You’ll need to [register a Google Maps API Key](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/map-section-api-key) to display the map.

map_style_id.label: Google Maps Map Id
map_style_id.info: Use [Google Maps Styling](https://console.cloud.google.com/google/maps-apis/client-styles) to change your map style.

image.label: Image
image.info: Displayed if the map isn’t loaded.

paragraph.content: Any customers who sign up will have an account created for them in Shopify. [View customers](/admin/customers?segment_query=email_subscription_status%20%3D%20%27SUBSCRIBED%27%20).
Any customers who sign up will have an account created for them in Shopify. [View customers](/admin/customers?segment_query=email_subscription_status%20%3D%20%27SUBSCRIBED%27%20).

enable_test.label: Enable test mode
enable_test.info: Test mode displays your popup each time even after dismissing it. Disable this option once you are happy with how your popup looks.

delay.label: Delay
delay.info: Delay is disabled in theme editor for visibility.

paragraph.content: Any customers who sign up will have an account created for them in Shopify. [View customers](/admin/customers?segment_query=email_subscription_status%20%3D%20%27SUBSCRIBED%27%20).

show_product_recommendations.label: Show dynamic recommendations
show_product_recommendations.info: Product recommendations change and improve with time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/development/recommended-products).

paragraph.content: Edit your product card settings in the "Theme settings" section.
